question:
State the ID and age of patient with positive degree of coagulation.
age refers to SUBTRACT(year(current_timestamp), year(Birthday)); positive degree of coagulation refers to RVVT = '+';
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM T1.Birthday) AS Age FROM Patient AS T1 INNER JOIN Examination AS T2 ON T1.ID = T2.ID WHERE T2.RVVT = '+'
